Reference

Reporting

Functions to speed up the formating of commonly reported measures

pretty_ci()

Format an estimate, lower and upper confidence intervals into a single character string

pretty_inline_ci()

Reformat an estimate, with lower/upper confidence/credible intervals with an explanatory note

pretty_per_effect()

A Function to Convert Effect Estimates into Percentage Changes

pretty_percentage()

Calculate a percentage, and then format for publication

pretty_round()

Round and format numeric vectors; standardising trailing zeros

Tables

Wrapper functions for table formating.

pretty_table()

Wrapper function for pretty tables

Referencing

Wrapper functions around captioner functionality.

pretty_captioner()

A wrapper for the captioner function

pretty_figref()

A wrapper for pretty_captioner with sensible defaults for captioning figures

pretty_tabref()

A wrapper for pretty_captioner with sensible defaults for captioning tables

pretty_supfigref()

A wrapper for pretty_captioner with sensible defaults for captioning supplementary figures

pretty_suptabref()

A wrapper for pretty_captioner with sensible defaults for captioning supplementary tables
